string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane3
I received permission to go all the way to #m270010300#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270010300##k and take out #r999 #o8200003##k. \n\n#o8200003# #r#a35031##k
I defeated 999 #o8200003#. #p2140000# granted me permission. Of course, this permission only allows me to go up to #m270010400#.
If you want to go in further, you'll need to take a harder test... Makes perfect sense, right? So what do you want? Do you want the new test?
Then go to #b#m270010300##k and defeat the #r#o8200003##k. If you defeat #r999#k of them, I will grant you permission to go beyond that.
That's too hard for you? That's too bad then. I guess you reached your limit.
You've defeated 999 #o8200003#. That's amazing. I will grant you the permission as promised.
As a representative of Rhinne, the Goddes of Time, I now grant you permission to look back at your 4th memory.

Alright then. Go ahead. You should be able to make it all the way to #b#m270010400##k. As you may have guessed, you won't be able to go beyond that. If you want to go further... you'll have to take a new test.
You haven't defeated 999 #r#o8200003##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
